are optional values, allowing you to set a custom logo on the transaction flow view, as well as set an auto-dismiss timeout of the success screen (if desired). The auto-dismiss timeout value can be set to values between 0.5 and 4 seconds.

You can also pass configuration parameters to customise the behaviour of the AdyenPOS SDK, such as setting custom auto-dismiss timeouts for the success screen.

method upon the initialization of the POS app, specifically when transitioning to the active state or when the app returns to the active state following background execution.

Handles the SDK onboarding
Our mobile solutions let you accept in-person payments on an iPhone, or on a card reader that is paired with an iOS mobile device through Bluetooth.
